scripts.build: npm run build:before && npm run build:configure && npm run build:rebuild && npm run build:linkdir && npm run build:after
scripts.build:configure: if [ -f src/binding.gyp ]; then cd src; fi && node-gyp configure --verbose --release --target_arch=x64 --coverage=true
scripts.build:rebuild: if [ -f src/binding.gyp ]; then cd src; fi && node-gyp rebuild --verbose --release --target_arch=x64 --coverage=true
scripts.build:linkdir: if [ ! -f build -a ! -s build ]; then ln -s src/build .; fi
scripts.test:chmpx: echo "Test - All" && if [ -d test_* ]; then TEST_DIR=`ls -1 | grep test_ | head -1`; else TEST_DIR=test; fi; ${TEST_DIR}/run_test.sh && echo "Finished"
scripts.test:chmpx:slave: echo "Test - chmpx slave" && if [ -d test_* ]; then TEST_DIR=`ls -1 | grep test_ | head -1`; else TEST_DIR=test; fi; ${TEST_DIR}/run_test.sh chmpx_slave && echo "Finished"
scripts.test:chmpx:server: echo "Test - chmpx server" && if [ -d test_* ]; then TEST_DIR=`ls -1 | grep test_ | head -1`; else TEST_DIR=test; fi; ${TEST_DIR}/run_test.sh chmpx_server && echo "Finished"
